subtitle: A simple but extremely tasty liver pate.

method.text: Heat the butter in a pan and fry the livers gently for 5-8 min. Don't overcook - the inside of the livers should be slightly pink.
Put the hot livers into a food processor or blender and blend to a smooth mixture.
Remove from food processor. Stir in the cream and brandy. Season.
Spoon into dishes and allow to cool before serving.

title: Chicken liver pate
